subject: College Athletics
Basketball
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The freshmen Moe Harkless and D’Angelo Harrison had season highs of 32 and 25 points and host St. John’s opened Big East play with a 91-67 victory over Providence on Tuesday night.
snippet: The freshmen Moe Harkless and D’Angelo Harrison had season highs of 32 and 25 points and host St. John’s opened Big East play with a 91-67 victory over Providence on Tuesday night.
